DPRK FM Meets New Austrian Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, December 17 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and conversed with new Austrian ambassador to the DPRK Martin Sajdik, who paid a courtesy call upon him Monday.
